name: 黃增隆
objective:
The course is designed to:
1.	To strengthen knowledge and skills in using AI (e.g., ChatGPT) for marketing management, this course will introduce generative AI (ChatGPT) and the marketing big data database (Statista comprehensive data database) to enhance students' competitiveness in AI application for marketing management and big data analysis.
2.	To help students become familiar with the knowledge of marketing management.
3.	To revisit every theory and concept learned in marketing management through case studies;
4.	Strengthen students' practical insight and achieve successful marketing management.
This course will play immersive English videos (business case videos) for students' discussion and learning. Therefore, the course will require students to use the Internet and computers to search for information.

為強化利用 AI (e.g., ChatGPT) 進行行銷管理的知識與技能，本課程將導入生成式 AI (ChatGPT) 與行銷大數據資料庫 (Statista 綜合數據資料庫)，培養學生 AI 應用行銷管理與大數據分析的競爭力。此外，本課程主要利用沈浸式英文影音 (商業影音個案) 方式學習行銷管理的概念與實務，因此本課程將會使用電腦影音設備以幫助同學更快速地融入行銷管理專業英文的學習情境。同學每週將會觀看，撰寫心得並研討一個行銷管理商業影音個案。藉此強化同學學習效果.
